title: What an Odd Thing to Say
author: VD
content_html:
No, the USS Nimitz Will Not Be Destroyed in a False Flag Operation

Baseless social media theories claim the USS Nimitz will be sacrificed in a false flag attack, but experts dismiss these as fear-driven misinformation amplified by viral algorithms.

Oh, well, then if the experts dismiss those theories, I guess we can be confident that the USS Nimitz won’t be sunk then. Right? Right?

DISCUSS ON SG
